docs.title: About
docs.text: This is pretty much my first time trying to make one of these nice #Readmes anyway this is a basic Client prediction uses ping of clients to find player's actual position It's generally correct but also kinda buggy and requires more work but maybe that for later

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
• Create a "UnreliableRemoteEvent" in game.ReplicatedStorage
  • Copy Client.luau and create a localscript in PlayerScripts and paste code
  • Copy Server.luau and create a script in ServerScriptService and paste code

Boom you are done.
